CREATE TABLE DisplacedIndividuals (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
);


CREATE TABLE DisplacedFamilies (
  family_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  head_of_family_id INT,
  address VARCHAR(200),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE AidOrganizations (
  org_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
);


CREATE TABLE AidRequests (
  request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  family_id INT,
  aid_org_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);
